children.statement: def text = ((((Select motion sensors, acceleration sensors, contact sensors or locks to control a set of lights.  + Each scenario can control dimmers and switches but can also be ) + restricted to modes or between certain times and turned off after ) + motion stops, doors close or lock. Scenarios can also be limited to  ) + running once or to stop running if the physical switches are turned off.)
